name: Antz io
description:
The game is played online in antz io army rails. The leader of the red band is the leader of the fighting team and is joined by thousands of insects. To find food and create You can have 1 insect room in each room, can play 15 persons / per room, 3 zones around the world.

Build insect army of your ants.
Find food to upgrade your army.
Race to the top
New insect collection
